name: Pop Puzzle HD - Block Hexa Puzzle Games Offline
name_original: Pop Puzzle HD - Block Hexa Puzzle Games Offline
description:
How to Play:
Just tap two or more poker of the same color.
There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.

Tips on Scoring:
The more poker you pop, the more score you will get.
Try to clear all poker, you will get a lot of bonus.

Features:
- Autosave when terminated or get a call.
- Save game to local game state position and load it at any time.
- NEW time challenge mode
- NEW high score challenge

More game modes are coming soon!
